title: Launcher not opening.
body: Anyone have this problem? You double click the league of legends icon, the league of legends symbol or icon comes up, and then goes away, and then nothing.. i've opened as administrator and same thing, logo comes up and then goes away and then nothing. I've restarted, I've turned off and on again.. Nothing.. Anything wrong with the game's launcher or has something become messed up on my end?

replies.body:
Hey there Rayzl,

We've received some reports regarding players having issues launching the patcher after Patch 6.6. Our community has quickly identified that players with Avast Antivirus has been overzealous with their protection and quarantined a file that the patcher needs to run.

If you have Avast Antivirus, please open it, go to your Virus Chest, look for _LoLPatcherUx.exe_, right-click it and "Restore and Add to Exclusions."

It might also help to submit  _LoLPatcherUx.exe_ to Avast's website so they can prevent false positive detections in the future through this link:

https://www.avast.com/false-positive-file-form.php

Lastly, if the patcher still doesn't work after doing that, please re-patch the game client by following the steps in our Knowledge Base article:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq4

If you're still having problems launching the patcher, contact my colleagues by submitting a ticket through the Support Site:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new

Make sure to attach your Process List, your launcher, kernel, and patcher logs.

That worked Son Golin, Thanks. It was LolLauncher.exe though, not LolPatcherUx.exe.

Avast also caught a temp file on the League of legends folder called TMP4C2B.tmp do i need to restore that one too?

thanks again.

> [{quoted}](name=Son Golin,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=st6APRTp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-24T04:44:06.478+0000)
>
> -snip-

I hijacked some of your wording for [this](http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/rqNLFGec-avast-false-positive-march-2016) thread on the EU boards.

Sorry but i dont see a "Virus chest" anywhere to fix that.
If you have an up-to-date version of Advast, you might need to right click on the icon (located on the bottom right). There should be an option for "Virus chest".
I've been having the exact same problems. Thank you for posting a solution rito
I've been having this issue too, but i don't have Avast.
Same. I have no download speed, yet obvious internet connection. Mac and Windows both sitting at 0 KBps.

Hey again everyone,

As an update, we've had confirmation from Avast that this should now have been resolved. You will need to update your Avast Antivirus definition files and there may still be a possibility that the League of Legends patcher won't properly launch as the required files may have already been quarantined. If that's the case, please follow the steps below to restore the files:

> You can restore the file from Avast Virus Chest by following these steps:
> 
> Open Avast and go to > SCAN > Scan for viruses > Quarantine (Virus Chest) > select the file you need to restore, right-click on it and click on "Restore".
> After this the file is restored back in it's original location and it won't be recognized as a suspicious file.

Get on your knees and pray to god, if you are really desperate cry while you are praying but don't fake cry, only cry if tears are actually coming. Say a rosary and read the bible.{{champion:18}}  main!!!
I've been having the same problems starting today :/
I deleted the new client because it was not letting me open the game and nowit is doing the same thing for the old one what do i do plz help me.

Hey guy's the only thing that worked was opening through:

C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_patcher\releases\0.0.0.52\deploy


NOTE: 0.0.0.52 WILL CHANGE. BECAUSE THE POST I READ SAID IT WAS  0.0.0.50 
           so it might differ slightly but it still worked. hope this helps. ^^

i tried everything listed below, as well as countless other solutions, but none of them worked. Finally I tried updating Windows and it fixed my launcher. So if you have tried everything and it still isn't working, make sure your Windows is up to date or wait till the next updates come.
i have the same problem now and i canot lanche the game
